economica es la siembra y cultivo de caña de azucar, este grupo es muy carismatico, 

trabajador y unido sus integrantes son:

Maria Felix venta de ropa 
Maurilia carpinteria
Adela abarrotes
Brijida venta de refrescos
Ricarda venta de ropa
Isadora venta de cosmeticos
Maria del Socorro venta de pollo 
Berenice venta de carne
Isabel venta de antojitos 
Eugenio venta de abarrotes
Cruzventa de ropa
Nancy alicia venta de frutas y legumbres
Maria de los Angeles venta de comida
Alma nelly venta de zapatos 
Daria venta de antijitos 
Obdulia venta de zapatos 
Demecia venta de antojitos 
Marcelaventa de antojitos

Doña Adela tiene la edad de 53 años, estudios hasta el quinto grado de pimaria y esta casada con el señor angel  y sus hijos ya estan casados,ella nos pltica que siempre a tenido que trabajar primero para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar pero actualmente ella tiene que ver por su familia ya que su esposo esta discapacitado, doña adela platica que inicio vendiendo carne de cerdo y carne enchilada con sus amigos y vecinos de la comunidad  pero ella siempre habia querido tener  una pequeña tienda de abarrotes  y Gracias a su trabajo hace un año construyo un pequeño local junto a su casa en el cual abrio su tienda de abarrotes, ella dice simpre le gusta tener surtido su negocio para que sus clientes siempre encuentren lo que busquen, apesar de que ya tiene su tienda de abarrotes ella continua relizando sus ventas de carne y su esposo la ayuuda a atender la tienda.

Ella invertira su credito en la compra de ceite de cocina, comida enlatada, frijoles, arroz, refrescos, dulces, sabritas, pan dulce, galletas, sal , azucar y mayonesa para resurtir su negocio.

ella desea que con esta inversion su negocio continue prosperando ya que desea tener una mejor calidad de vida y sus ganancias las invertira en resurtir su negocio.

loans.use: To buy cooking oil, canned food, beans, rice, soft drinks, sweets, chips, sweet bread, biscuits, salt, sugar and mayonnaise.

location.town: Aserradero, Acatlan de Perez Figueroa, Oaxaca

loans.name: Ziynat

texts.ru: Зыйнат – участник группы «Курпулдок», 39 лет, замужем, воспитывает 2 детей. Зыйнат работает учителем в школе и в качестве дополнительного дохода занимается животноводством и полеводством. На сегодня Зыйнат имеет в хозяйстве 1 дойную корову, 2 бычка и землю, где она выращивает клевер, ячмень и сахарную свеклу. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Зыйнат обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку семян сахарной свеклы и удобрений.  Доходы от кредита Зыйнат  планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Ziynat is a participant of the "Kurpuldok" group.  She is 39 years old, married and raising two children.  Ziynat works as a teacher at a school and to provide an additional source of income, is involved in animal husbandry and farming.  Today, she owns a dairy cow, two bulls and land, where she grows clover, barley and sugar beats.  In order to further develop her business, Ziynat requested a loan in the amount of 30,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy sugar beat seeds and fertilizers.  She plans to invest the earnings into a continued expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.ru: Гулбахор замужем и на воспитании имеет троих дочерей и одного сына. Супруг занимается продажей строительных материалов, а Гулбахор более 6 лет занимается приготовлением плова на рынке строительных материалов. В месяц 28 дней работает. Благодаря бизнесу она содержит своих детей в хороших условиях. Имеет много постоянных клиентов. Кредитуется в ИМОН Интернешнл несколько лет, имеет хорошую репутацию и кредитную историю. Гулбахор запрашивает займ для достройки  веранды и потолков, также для закупка гипсокартона.
texts.en: Gulbahor is married and bringing up three daughters and a son. Her husband sells construction materials, while Gulbahor has been preparing pilaf at the market for constructions materials for more than six years. She works 28 days out of the month. Because of her business, she keeps her children in good circumstances. Gulbahor has many regular clients. She has received loans from IMON International for several years, has a good reputation and credit history. Gulbahor is seeking a loan for construction of a veranda and ceilings, as well as for the purchase of drywall.

loans.use: To purchase of drywall

loans.name: Ledelia

texts.en:
Ledelia is a 42-year-old married woman with four children aged between 4 and 18 years. Her husband works as a fisherman.

Ledelia runs a small sari-sari store business. She sells vinegar, soy sauce, and spices. Ledelia requested a loan to buy more merchandise to sell such as canned goods and toiletries. She hopes to increase her sales and profitability. She also hopes to venture into other businesses in the future.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to sell such as canned goods and toiletries.

loans.name: Marie Rosine

texts.en:
Marie Rosine is 27 years old. She is married to a carpenter and they have three children. 

She has been selling onions for the past six years. The loan will be used for buying more onions to sell. She plans to use the profits from the business for savings.

loans.use: to buy more onions to sell.

loans.name: Sum

texts.en:
Sum is 60 years old, a humble resident who permanently lives in Kampong Chhnang province. She owns and manages a rice farming business to generate a livelihood. Agriculture is the main source of her income. She has been engaged in this business for almost 20 years. Normally, she is able to make income approximately of USD 4.00 per day to cover her daily expenses. She particularly uses her income to spend on food and her daily allowances.

Sum would like to expand her land size and thereby increase her household income. So now she is asking for a loan of KHR 1,000,000 from HKL to purchase an additional plot of farmland for farming purposes. Though this investment, Sum hopes to further improve her business and better her living standard. This is her first loan and she is confident of being able to pay her loan back punctually.

loans.use: to purchase an additional plot of farmland for farming purposes.

loans.name: Lillian

texts.en:
Lillian is 38 years old, married to Robert, and blessed with five children aged 16, 12, eight, four and three years. She owns a boutique cum salon, a business she started five years ago and earns a monthly income of KES 20,000. 

She has requested a loan of KES 30,000 to purchase ladies' skirt suits, trouser suits, shoes and handbags for sale. The profit she earns will be ploughed back into her business. 

Her dream is to give her children the best education as well as see her business expand to greater levels. This is her first loan.

loans.use: To purchase ladies' skirt suits, trouser suits, ladies' shoes and handbags.

loans.name: Marieta

texts.en:
Marieta is from D' Fernan, Bonifacio. She is 43 years old. Marieta is married and has 4 children. To make a living, Marieta owns & operates a general store. She has been in her business for 6 years and earns 20,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2008, Marieta joined GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of 40,200 PHP which will be used to obtain products such as shampoo, some food for snacks, sugar, soap & toothpaste. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to obtain products such as shampoo, some food for snacks, sugar, soap & toothpaste

loans.name: Agua De Coihue Group

texts.es:
Este Banco Comunal se llama “Agua de Coihue” está conformado por 17 emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se encuentran; vivero de flores y arboles, comida rápida, venta de ropa, venta de mermeladas, peluquería, artesanía en tejidos. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la cuidad de Chillan.
María, Secretaria del Banco comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra de pie ocupando la segunda fila de derecha a izquierda, viste con polera blanca y encima lleva un chaleco de color negro, usa lentes, su cabello lo usa tomado.
Ella se dedica al rubro de ventas de joyas hace 2 meses, en el cual trabaja sola.
La mercadería que necesita la compra en Chillan, donde encuentra productos a mitad de precio.
Con el crédito comprará joyas que incluirán más accesorios para sus clientes.
Las metas están enfocadas en tener un local en Coihueco.
María vive junto a su marido quien se desempeña como chofer y juntos a sus 2 hijos pequeños. Sus sueños son poder tener su propio local.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad que le ha brindado Fondo Esperanza para invertir en su negocio. Además  se siente muy contenta con el grupo que participa en el cual existe mucha confianza.
Chillán es una comuna de la zona centro sur de Chile. Su nombre significa “silla del sol” en mapudungun, idioma de nuestros indígenas mapuches. Chillán es conocida como “Cuna de la Patria” o “Tierra de Artistas”, debido a que en la ciudad han nacido destacados personajes de la historia de Chile, como por ejemplo el conocido pianista Claudio Arrau.
texts.en:
This community bank is called “Agua de Coihue” (Water of Coihue) and it is made up of 17 entrepreneurs in different activities, among which are the growing of trees and flowers, fast food, clothing sales, marmalade sales, hair styling, knitted handicrafts.  They are all residents of the city of Chillan.
Maria, secretary of the community bank, can be found in the picture standing in the second row from right to left, dressed in a while polo shirt with a black vest on top, wearing glasses and her hair twisted. She has been in jewelry sales for two months, an activity that she performs alone.  The merchandise that she needs she buys in Chillan, where she can find products at half price.
With the loan she will buy jewelry that will include more accessories for her customers. Her goals are focused on getting a space in Coihueco.
Maria lives with her husband, who works as a driver, and their two children.  Her dreams are to have her own store.
She is very happy and thankful with the support that she has received from Fondo Esperanza to invest in her business.  She is also very happy with the group where she belongs in which she finds mutual trust.
Chillan is a community in the south central area of Chile.  The name means "seat of the sun" in mapudungun, the language of the native mapuches.
Chillan is known as the "Craddle of the Country" or "Land of Artists" because in this city several well known people in Chile's history were born, such as the distinguished pianist Claudio Arrau.

loans.use: to purchase jewelry that will provide more accessories for her customers.

loans.name: Julio Ernesto

texts.es:
Julio, vive en casa propia con su familia, sus cuatro hijos y su esposa, él se dedica a trabajar la agricultura, desde pequeño inicio en este trabajo ya que su padre tambien ha sido agricultor.
El solicita un préstamo para la compra de 2000 plantas de chile, abono y foliares, para poder iniciar su siembra de chiles, con este préstamo tendrá la oportunidad de iniciar nuevamente un cultivo del cual espera recibir buenos frutos.
El objetivo de Julio es poder ayudar a su familia, por medio de su trabajo, generándoles una mejor condición económica, apoyando a sus hijos en todo lo que ellos necesiten.
texts.en:
Julio lives in his own house with his family: his wife and four children. He is a farmer, and began this work at a young age, as his father had also been a farmer.

He is applying for a loan to buy 2000 chili pepper plants, as well as organic and foliar fertilizers, in order to start planting his chili pepper crop. With this loan he will have the opportunity to again start a crop, from which he expects to receive good results.

Julio's aim is to be able to help his family through his work, creating a better economic situation for them, and supporting his children in everything that they need.

loans.use: To buy 2000 chili pepper plants, as well as organic and foliar fertilizers.

loans.name: Vincent

texts.en:
Vincent is 43 years old, married, and has four children. He owns a spare parts shop which he has been operating for eleven years. He started as a mechanic and then later saved to start the shop. 

He faces challenges of power regularly being off. His family goal is to educate his children. He wishes to expand his business to new markets. He intends to use the loan for purchasing spare parts.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to sell.

loans.name: Marie

texts.en: Marie is aged 35. She is a mother of three children aged between one and 12. The oldest child goes to school. Marie owns a general store which she has been running for the past six years. With the loan, she plans to add more items in the store such as sugar, maize flour, rice, and salt to sell. The profits from the business will be used for making more savings to reinvest again for the better future of the business.

loans.use: To buy more sugar, maize flour and salt to sell.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 32 years old and is a married woman with 4 children aged between 2 and 14 years. She and her husband run a fishing business in Bien Unido, Bohol. Marilyn sells her husband's catch at the market. She applied for a loan to purchase fishing nets and gasoline for the boat. This will bring in more fish for Marilyn to sell. 

Marilyn hopes to purchase an additional fishing boat in the future. She also hopes for her children to finish college and become successful.

loans.use: to purchase fishing nets and gasoline for the boat

loans.name: Esterlita

texts.en: Esterlita is a married woman with three children. Esterlita is 50 years old and resides at Mantic, Tangub City, Philippines. Esterlita used her last loan to purchase additional products to sell. Her business grew and become successful. Now, she's taking out a new loan to buy more "ukay-ukay" (used clothing) to sell. Positively, she hopes to be able to grow her business even more.

loans.use: to buy more "ukay-ukay" (used clothing) to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, shampoo and beverages

loans.name: Marie Grace

texts.en: Marie Grace is 35 years old. She sells skirts and has been in the business for four years. She is married and has three children; all of them go to school. She has requested this loan to buy more skirts to sell. The profits from the business will be used for paying school fees for the children.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Haron

texts.en:
Haron is a 42-year-old man from Bungoma. He is married to Eunice and they have three children aged between 10 and 18 years.

Haron sells mobile phones and accessories, a business he has been doing for the last six years. He makes a monthly income of KES 150,000. 

He is taking his second KADET LTD loan, which he will use to buy phone accessories and mobile phones for sale. He will use the profits to open another business outlet. His dream is to have a stable business.

loans.use: to buy phone accessories and mobile phones for sale.

loans.name: Homidkhoja

texts.ru: Хомидхоча женат имеет одного сына. Он занимался вместе с членами семьи матерью, женой и сестрой выпечкой самбусы. Члены семьи выпекали самбусу и он реализовал на рынке. Семья большая так как у него на иждивении находятся также мать и сестра. Содержать семью очень трудно и поэтому он начал новый бизнес взяв кредит в Имон Интернешнл. В настоящее время он продает мужскую одежду. Он хочет получить займ в размере 3000 долларов США для расширения ассортимента товаров. Он надеется на поддержку с вашей стороны и уверен что вы его поддержите.
texts.en: Homidkhoja is married and has a son. He used to bake sambusa along with his mother, wife, and sister. Members of his family would bake the sambusa, and he would sell it at the market. His family is big, as his mother and sister are also dependent on him. Supporting the family is difficult, which is why Homidkhoja started a new business by taking out a loan from IMON International. Now he sells men's clothing. He wants to take out a loan of US$3000 in order to expand the selection of goods. He is hoping for your support and is confident that you will help.

loans.use: To buy merchandise

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en: Agnes is taking out another loan of Ksh 50,000 to start a new business selling clothes. With the loan, she intends to purchase bundles of clothes to sell. Since the previous loan, her living standards have improved. The last loan allowed her to increase her monthly income. Agnes thanks Yehu and Kiva for their support.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of clothes to sell.

loans.name: Assumpta

texts.en: Assumpta is married with two children living in Hioma, Uganda. She operates a business selling fresh foods like vegetables and fruits. She faces challenges of high fuel and transport costs plus weather variations. She hopes to build a permanent house and  expand her business to new markets. Assumpta intends to use the loan to buy  fruits like oranges and bananas to sell.

loans.use: to purchase fruits like oranges and bananas to sell.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a farmer in the Kitale area of Western Kenya, where she has been farming for twenty years. Her farm is currently run with the help of one farmhand and produces milk, maize, beans, and eggs as the leading products. All her products are sold within the local markets.

Mary has requested a loan of 80,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy poultry birds at 50,000 KES and construct a dairy unit at 30,000 KES. She says the farming income will help her educate six of her children who are still schooling.

Mary adds that Juhudi Kilimo loans have made her realize her potential in business, since this is not her first loan.

loans.use: to buy poultry birds and construct a dairy unit.

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es: Carmen es socia del Bancomunal Sol Radiante, tiene 39 años de edad, es casada y madre de 3 hijos, es socia de FINCA Perú hace 9 años. Se dedica a la venta de especerías y condimentos en el mercado. Agradece a la institución por las facilidades de préstamo que le brindaron, le gusta mucho las capacitaciones que recibe en su Bnacomunal ya que  son de mucha ayuda para su formación moral y  para el manejo de su negocio. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de verduras para preparar sus especerías como espinaca, culantro, perejil.
texts.en:
Carmen is a member of the “Sol Radiante” (Radiant Sun) communal bank.  She is 39 years old, married, and has three children.

She has been a member of Finca Perú for nine years.  She sells spices and condiments at the market.

She is grateful to the institution for the good terms of the loan they offered her.  She really likes the trainings that she gets in her communal bank because they help a lot with her moral foundation, and they help her run her business.

She will use the loan she is requesting to buy vegetables to prepare spices like spinach, cilantro, and parsley.

loans.use: to buy vegetables to prepare spices like spinach, cilantro, and parsley.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy laminated wood for his business.

loans.name: Olga Yamila

texts.es:
Olga, se dedica a la venta de ropa y productos escolares, ella vive con su esposo y tiene dos hijos de 10 y 12 años de edad, ella es comerciante desde hace 7 años, trabaja todos los días de las 6:00am hasta las 5:00pm, este negocio fue iniciativa propia junto con su esposo.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de ropa y útiles escolares, para salir a vender, la ropa es variada entre blusas, short, camisetas, ropa interior, este préstamo le ayudara para fortalecer el negocio, y con las ganancias podrá tambien ayudar más a su familia.
El objetivo de Olga es preparar a sus hijos académicamente, por medio de su trabajo constante espera algún día alcanzar este objetivo.
texts.en:
Olga sells clothing and school products.  She lives with her husband and has two children, 10 and 12 years old.  She has been in sales for 7 years.  She works every day from 6:00 am until 5:00 pm.  She started this business on her own initiative with the help of her husband.
She is requesting a loan to purchase clothing and school supplies to resell.  The clothing consists of blouses, shorts, T-shirts, and underwear.  This loan will help strengthen her business and with the income she will be able to provide more help to her family.
Olga's objective is to academically help her children.  With her consistent work she hopes to one day achieve this goal.

loans.use: to buy clothing and school supplies to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase sugar, eggs, rice, oil, salt and sweets.

loans.name: Maria Basilia

texts.es:
María, solicita un nuevo préstamo para la compra de materiales para la elaboración de tortillas como el maíz y leña, estos los obtendrá al mayoreo, le ayudara a seguir trabajando y poder seguir vendiendo a su clientela.
Ella manifiesta haber tenido un buen efecto con su préstamo anterior, porque logro tener la materia prima para seguir vendiendo tortillas y generar ganancias.
texts.en:
María is requesting a new loan to buy materials like corn and firewood to make tortillas.  She will get these materials wholesale, and it will help her to continue working and to be able to continue selling to her clientele.

She states that the previous loan had a good impact.  This is because she managed to have the raw materials in order to continue selling tortillas and generating income.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood.

loans.name: Valeriana

texts.es: Valeriana es socia del Bancomunal Sol Radiante, tiene 50 años de edad, es madre soltera de 4 hijos, y es socia de FINCA Perú hace 5 años. Se siente orgullosa de todo lo que ha logrado con su ahorro y las capacitaciones que recibe en su Bancomunal fueron de mucha ayuda para ella ya que aprendió a valorarse a sí misma y más aún cumplió su deseo de brindar una buena educación a sus hijos. Es dueña de un  Restaurante en el cual pone en práctica todo lo que aprendió en las capacitaciones como la buena atención a sus clientes. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de abarrotes para su restaurante como azúcar, arroz, leche, y otros.
texts.en: Valeriana is a member of the community bank Sol Radiante.  She is 50 years old, is a single mother of 4 children and has been a member of FINCA Peru for the last 5 years.  She is proud of all that she has achieved with her saving.  The qualifications that she gets from her community bank have been very helpful to her as she has learned to value herself and more so as she achieved her wishes of providing a good education for her children.  She is the owner of a restaurant where she puts in practice all that she has learned such as giving good service for her customers.  The loan that she is requesting she will invest in the purchase of groceries such as sugar, rice, milk and others.

loans.use: to purchase groceries such as sugar, rice, milk and others for her restaurant.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es: Teodora es socia del Bancomunal Sol Radiante, tiene 51 años de edad, es madre de 3 hijos y socia de FINCA Perú hace 1 año. Se dedica a la venta de golosinas en el cafetín de un centro educativo. Está muy agradecida con la institución por las facilidades de préstamo que le brindaron. Le gustan mucho las capacitaciones que recibe en su Bancomunal ya que ahí aprendió a invertir de manera adecuada su dinero y sobre todo a valorarse a sí misma. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá  en la compra de golosinas para su negocio.
texts.en: Teodora is a member of the communal bank "Sol Radiante" (Radiant Sun).  She is 51 years old, the mother of 3 children and has been a member of FINCA Perú for 1 year.  She makes her living selling sweets at the cafe of an educational institution.  She is very grateful to FINCA Perú for the re-payment terms she has been offered.  Teodora really likes the training that she receives as a part of the communal bank.  She has learned to invest her money appropriately and especially to value herself.  The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of sweets for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sweets for her business.

loans.name: Yanira Del Carmen

texts.es:
Yanira, solicita un nuevo préstamo, ya que se encuentra instalando la energía eléctrica, para esto deberá pagar por la instalación, para esto le servirá este préstamo, también comprara mercadería para el negocio.
Ella manifiesta haber crecido con la utilización del préstamo anterior, le permitió mayor solvencia para estar al día con los pedidos, dándole una mejor condición de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Yanira is requesting a new loan because she needs to pay for the installation of electricity.  That is what the loan is for, and she will also buy merchandise for her business.

She notes that she has grown with the use of the previous loan.  It allowed her greater solvency in order to be up to date with the orders.  This gave her family better living conditions.

loans.use: to pay to install electricity.

loans.name: Yanira Elizabeth

texts.es:
Yanira, administra una tienda y pupuseria, ella vive con su esposo y tres hijos de 14, 8 y 5 años de edad, los cuales cursan educación básica, Yanira tiene 7 años de manejar el negocio, lo atiende desde las 8:00am hasta las 6:00pm, tiene experiencia en el negocio, ella inicio como empleada de una tienda, luego decidió instalar la propia donde ofrece además pupusas y comida. 
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería, con la que quiere abastecer el negocio, comprara aceite, arroz, embutidos, condimentos, jugos, gaseosas, galletas, los cuales son bastante demandados por los clientes, este préstamo le ayudara a incrementar el negocio, tambien podrá mejorar la atención en la venta de pupusas y comida.
La aspiración de Yanira es que su negocio crezca, que sus clientes aumenten y sacar adelante a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Yanira runs a small grocery and "pupuseria" (a store that sells pupusas, corn tortillas stuffed with cheese, beans, and meat and then grilled).  Yanira lives with her husband and three children, who are 14, 8 and 5 years old.  They are all in primary school.  Yanira has been running the store for 7 years.  She is open from 8:00am until 6:00pm.  She has a lot of experience in the business.  She started as an employee of another store and then decided to open her own store but to offer pupusas and food as well.
Yanira is requesting the loan to purchase merchandise, with which she plans to stock up her store.  She will buy oil, rice, sausages, condiments, juice, sodas and crackers, which are in high demand by her customers.  This loan will help her to expand her business and to give more time to selling her pupusas and other food.
Yanira's hopes are to grow her business, to increase her customer base and to help her children get ahead.

loans.use: to purchase oil, rice, sausages, condiments, juice, sodas and crackers.

loans.name: Mary Languidey

texts.es: La señora Mary  tiene 64 años oriunda de la localidad La Guardia  Santa Cruz, vive con el Sr. Seferino,  viven en su propio domicilio que se encuentra ubicado Zona La Guardia, su actividad económica es venta frutas según a la temporada, se dedica a esta actividad hace 23 años, el destino del crédito es para la compra fruta de la temporada por mayor para surtir su puesto de venta ya que constantemente tiene que ir comprando fruta segun a la temporada, con el anterior credito le fue muy bien, la Sra. Mary a pesar de ser una persona mayor sigue trabajando, ya que esta es única fuente de ingresos, se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo que se le ha brindado.
texts.en:
Sra. Mary is 64 years old and a native of La Guardia in Santa Cruz. She and Sr. Seferino live together in their own home, which is located in the district of La Guardia. Her economic activity is the sale of seasonal fruits and she has been in business for 23 years.

Mary will use the loan to buy seasonal fruits wholesale in order to stock her sales stall since she constantly has to buy fruit according to the season. She did very well with the previous loan.

Sra. Mary, despite being a senior, continues working since this is her only source of income. She is grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided her

loans.use: to purchase seasonal fruits.

loans.name: Carlos Ernesto

texts.es:
Carlos, solicita un nuevo préstamo para la reparación de su vehículo, el cual utiliza a diario para la realización de su trabajo, comprara llantas, reparación de fricciones, esto le ayudara a tener mayor seguridad al viajar y también a quienes buscan de su trabajo.
El considera que sus condiciones han cambiado, pues su vehiculo no le ha ocacionado muchos problemas y que aun esta pagando mensualmente su propia casa, de los ingresos que recibe como taxista.
texts.en: Carlos is requesting a new loan to do some repairs to his vehicle, which he uses daily to do his work.  He will buy tires and replace his brake pads.  This will help him to have greater safety on the road for himself and his passengers.  He finds that his situation has changed, as his vehicle has not given him a lot of problems, and he is even making his monthly house payments from the income that he receives as a taxi driver.

loans.use: to buy tires and repair his brake pads

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es:
Oscar, administra una tienda de productos de consumo y tambien siembra granos básicos, él vive con su familia formada por su esposa y tres hijos de 11, 10 y 5 años, el se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijoles, al mismo tiempo y con ayuda de su familia administra una tienda desde hace 6 años, aprendió con sus padres.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de abono para ser aplicados a la próxima siembra y la compra de dos cerdos, esta compra le ayudara a tener lo necesario para el desarrollo del cultivo, además de tener una nueva línea de ingreso, su riesgo es los fuertes temporales en época de invierno.
Oscar tiene como objetivo establecer un negocio más rentable, que le permita estabilizar las condiciones de vida personal y familiarmente, ayudando a sus hijos en la educación.
texts.en:
Oscar runs a small grocery store and also plants grain crops.  He lives with his family, a wife and three children who are 11, 10 and 5 years old.  Oscar makes his living planting corn and beans.  At the same time, and with his family's help, he runs a small grocery store, and has done so for the last 6 years.  He learned his trade from his parents.
Oscar is requesting the loan in order to purchase fertilizer, which will be used in the next planting, and two pigs.  With the purchase, he will have everything he needs to grow his crop and to have a new source of income.  The risk comes from the strong wintertime storms.
Oscar's goals are to establish a more profitable business, which would allow him to stabilize his personal living condition and that of his family, and to support his children in their educations.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and two pigs.

loans.name: Rosa Mirian

texts.es:
Rosa, solicita un nuevo préstamo con la intensión de mejorar la venta de sus productos, comprara hot dog, salchichas, aderezos aceite, quesillo y chicharrón, con esta compra estará contando con todo lo necesario para poder seguir trabajando.
Ella considera que el préstamo anterior le ayudo a mantenerse en el negocio, con sus clientes, y con buenos ingresos, estos le ayudaran a mejorar su local y las condiciones de su familia.
texts.en: Rosa is requesting another loan with the intention of improving the sale of her products. She will buy hot dogs, sausage, seasoning, cooking oil, cheese, and fried pork rinds. With these purchases, she will have everything necessary to be able to keep working. She thinks that the previous loan helped her to stay in business with good income, which will help her to improve her area, and her family's conditions.

loans.use: to buy hot dogs, sausage, seasoning, cooking oil, cheese, and fried pork rinds.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Jovana

texts.es: Jovana de 32 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y su hija de 13 años al sur de la ciudad, donde tiene su propio negocio, en el cual presta el servicios de Internet y de telecomunicaciones por minutos, además de vender mercancía variada que es otra de sus actividades generadoras de ingresos; en el sector donde habita es muy conocida y es aquí donde ha conseguido la mayor parte de sus clientes, porque también tiene compradores en otros barrios de la ciudad, especialmente de mercancías variadas. Ella cuando inició su negocio lo hizo con recursos propios, con el objetivo de apoyar el buen desempeño de su cónyuge, quien fue el que le aportó su primer capital semilla por valor de $1.000.000 COP., para que ella adecuara las instalaciones con equipos de cómputos, que ubicó en la sala de la casa, donde aun habita con su familia. Su meta es tener los equipos de cómputos mas modernos que existan en el mercado y fortalecer su punto, adicionando mucho inventario de mercancías variadas tipo miscelánea, pero su mayor desafío es que no cuenta con el capital de trabajo suficiente para lograr sus expectativas, esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo,  con el cual comprará productos de papelería, para iniciar su camino ascendente hacia el crecimiento de su negocio y cumplir con el sueño de ver a su hija en un futuro convertida en una persona de éxito.
texts.en:
Jovana, age 32, lives with her husband and 13 year old daughter to the south of the city.  That is where they have a business providing Internet and telecommunication services by the minute.  This is in addition to selling varied merchandise, which is another of her business activities that generates income.

She is very well-known in the sector where she lives, and that is where she has gotten most of her customers.  She also has buyers, especially of her varied merchandise, in other neighborhoods in the city.

When she started her business she did it with her own resources.  Her objective was to support her husband’s achievement.  He was the one that contributed her first seed money for $1.000.000 COP so that she could adapt the establishment with computer equipment.  She put the equipment in the living room of the house where she still lives with her family.

Her goal is to have the most modern computer equipment that exixts in the market and to strengthen her place.  She will do this by adding a lot of inventory of varied, miscellaneous merchandise.

However, her greatest challenge is that she does not have sufficient working capital to achieve her expectations.  That is why she turns to a Kiva loan, her first loan with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  She will use the loan to buy stationery products in order to start on the uphill road towards the growth of her business.  Then she will fulfill her dream of seeing her daughter become a successful person in the future.

loans.use: to buy stationery products for her Internet Cafe.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
Maribel, actualmente esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materiales para el negocio de las tortillas, comprara maíz, leña y gas para seguir en su venta, esperando que sea fluido la demanda de los clientes, para tener los ingresos para cancelar bien este préstamo.
Ella manifiesta que este préstamo le ayudara igual que el anterior, el cual le financio los materiales para estabilizar el negocio, mejorando sus ganancias para la familia.
texts.en:
Maribel is requesting this current loan in order to buy material for her tortilla-making business. She will use the money to buy corn, firewood and gas so that she can continue to sell tortillas, in the hope that her client demand will be constant so that she can pay off this loan in time.  

She says that this loan will help her just like the previous one which she used to finance the materials to establish the business, improving her family's income.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood and gas.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es:
Lucia, esta solicitando un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en las bebidas y crianza de ganado, el se decidió porque quiere surtir el negocio comprando variedad de gaseosas, también comprara concentrado para alimentar el ganado.
Ella tuvo un efecto positivo con el préstamo anterior, pues le permitió mejorar su nivel de ingresos dándole mayor rentabilidad, también compro ganado y sus condiciones familiares son más favorables.
texts.en:
Lucia is applying for a new loan to invest in drinks and animal husbandry. She wants to restock her business by purchasing a variety of soft drinks and she also wants to buy feed for her livestock.

She had a positive effect with her previous loan because it allowed her to improve her income, giving her greater profitability. She also bought livestock and her family situation is more favorable.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks and to buy feed for her livestock.

loans.name: Tania Magdalena

texts.es:
La Señora Tania es socia del banco comunal Medio Ejido, vive por el sector de la Mutualista Azuay en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad con hermosos paisajes permitiéndonos admirar la belleza de la naturaleza, es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, tiene una gran belleza natural y cultural, la misma que aun conservan sus habitantes.

La Señora Tania tiene 21 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido una hija de 5 años que estudia en un jardín de infantes de la ciudad. Su esposo labora en un taller de latonería (arreglo de latas de vehículos), no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en una casa de un familiar. 

Nuestra socia labora como empleada privada en un local donde realizan artesanías para arreglos de eventos sociales, labora de lunes a sábados todo el día.

Este es el tercer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en víveres para su hogar.
 
Su sueño es de llegar a tener un negocio propio como una Boutique.
texts.en:
Tania is a member of the Medio Ejido communal bank. She lives in the Mutualista Azuay sector in the city of Cuenca, a city with beautiful landscapes permitting us to admire the beauty of nature. Since December 1999, it has been designated a World Heritage Site. It has great natural and cultural beauty, which its inhabitants still preserve.

Tania is 21 years old. She is married, and from this union she has a 5-year-old daughter who attends kindergarten in the city. Her husband works in an auto body shop. She doesn't have her own house, so she lives in a family member's home.

Our member works as a private employee in a shop where they make handcrafts for arrangements at social events. She works Mondays through Saturdays all day.

This is the third loan she has taken through the communal bank, and she is going to use it for provisions for her home. 

Her dream is to have her own business such as a boutique.

loans.use: to buy provisions for her home

loans.name: Nargiza

texts.ru: Наргиза замужем и любящая мать двоих сыновей. Сыновья учатся в средней школе. Более 12 лет она занимается купле- продажей мужской одежды. В бизнесе занимается одна. Приобретает товар на местном рынке. Муж находится в Российской Федерации и ежемесячно отправляет деньги. Наргиза хочет отремонтировать свой дом и с этой целью запрашивает займ в размере 11000 сомони. Она надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Nargiza is married and a loving mother of two sons.  Her sons attend a secondary school.  Nargiza has been involved in buying and selling men's clothing for over 12 years.  She runs this business by herself.  She buys merchandise at a local market.  Nargiza's husband is in the Russian Federation and sends money home every month.  Nargiza wants to repair her house and is requesting a loan in the amount of 11,000 somoni for this purpose.  She relies on your help and mercy.

loans.use: to repair her house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy textiles for making sports uniforms

loans.name: Cesar Antonio

texts.es:
Cesar Antonio tiene 41 años de edad, es casado, tiene 3 hijos entre 16 y 8 años de edad, vive con su familia en la ciudad de San Pedro Sula, Cortes.
Cesar tiene un negocio de una pulpería. Este negocio lo tiene desde hace 2 años y vende productos de la canasta básica como harina, maseca, arroz, frijoles etc. también vende productos de abarrotería como pastas, papel higiénico etc. El negocio con la buena administración que le ha dado apoyado por su esposa esta en mejores condiciones que antes.
Es por eso que decidió solicitar un préstamo con ODEF de 15,300 lempiras para abastecerse de productos alimenticios con mucha demanda en el hogar. Con esta inversión esta convencido que mejorara las ventas y sus ingresos serán mucho mejor.
La meta que el tiene es seguir trabajando y poder seguir obteniendo ayuda de los prestamos que solicite a ODEF.
texts.en:
Cesar Antonio, 41, is married and has three children whose ages range between 16 and 8 years; he lives with his family in the city of San Pedro Sula, Cortes.

Cesar has a grocery store; he’s had it for the last two years and he sells basic staple items like flour, Maseca [brand of corn flour], rice, beans, etc.  He also sells grocery items like pasta, toilet paper, etc.  With the good management he’s provided the store with his wife’s help it's in better condition than previously.

Because of this he’s decided to ask ODEF for a 15,300 lempira loan to stock up on foodstuffs that are in high demand for home use.  He is sure that with this investment his sales will improve and his income will be much better.

His goal is to continue working and to be able to continue getting help from the loans he requests from ODEF.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs to stock his store.

loans.name: Nancy Juana

texts.es: La Nancy tiene 45 años y es casada con 2 hijos que son de las edades de 8 y 10 años,  su actividad es la de venta de comida y cartón para la envoltura de regalos su puesto de venta se encuentra en zona de villa Bolívar de la ciudad de El Alto (al sur de esta ciudad). Este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Nancy  va a usar este préstamo  para compra de insumos para preparar sus comidas comprara abarrotes, arroz, fideo otros su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de capital de trabajo, la Sra. Nancy  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia diaria ya que por la zona varias son las que venden comida va a utilizar los beneficios en el crecimiento del negocio.
texts.en:
Nancy, 45, is married and has two children who are 8 and 10 years old.  Her activity is selling food and gift wrapping paper in her stand located in the Bolívar zone in the city of El Alto (in the south of this city).  

This loan is the first sequence in the institution and Nancy will use the loan to buy ingredients to prepare her dishes like rice, noodles and others.  The reason for requesting this loan is the lack of working capital. 

The business challenge Nancy faces daily is competition because there are many others selling food in her zone.  She will use the profits for the business’ growth.

loans.use: to buy groceries.

loans.name: Shavkat

texts.ru: Шавкат проживает в Гиссарском районе. Ему 30 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Шавкат занимается частным извозом. Кроме того он занимается животноводством. Этим видом деятельности занимается три года. Кредит берет для закупа телят и бычков.
texts.en: Shavkat lives in the Gissar district.  He is 30 years old, married and has three children.  Shavkat is involved in private transportation.  Besides this, he is involved in animal husbandry.  He has been in this business for three years.  Shavkat is requesting this loan to buy calves and bulls.

loans.use: to buy calves and bulls

loans.name: Johnson

texts.en: Johnson is hard-working, and he owns a spare parts shop. He is married with two children. He has been running this business for three years now. He faces a challenge of high fuel costs. His family goal is to educate his children. He hopes to expand his business to new markets, and he intends to use the loan for buying spare parts to add to his business stock.

loans.use: To purchase spare parts

loans.name: Diana Isabel

texts.es:
La Señora. Diana es socia del banco comunal Medio Ejido, vive por el sector de Medio Ejido en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad con hermosos paisajes permitiéndonos admirar la belleza de la naturaleza, es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, tiene una gran belleza natural y cultural, la misma que aun conservan sus habitantes.

La Señora Diana tiene 36 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos  de 13 y 10 años de edad, su primera hija estudia el colegio y su segundo hijo en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo es de profesión chofer y presta sus servicios en una institución privada, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
 
Doña Diana labora como empleada privada hace un año y medio, labora de lunes a sábados todo el día, por las noches y en sus tiempos libres se dedica a vender comida lleva 3 años en el negocio, también realiza bocaditos pero solo bajo pedido. 

Se encuentra en el banco comunal hace 3 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de víveres para la preparación de sus productos.
 
Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Diana is a member of the “Medio Ejido” communal bank; she lives in Medio Ejido in the city of Cuenca, a city with beautiful scenery that allows us to admire nature’s beauty.  Since December, 1999, it’s been a World Cultural Heritage site.  It has great natural and cultural beauty which its inhabitants still preserve.

Diana is 36 years old, married and has two children who are 13 and 10 years old.  Her oldest daughter attends secondary school and her son is in the local elementary school.  Her husband is a driver by profession and works for a private institution.  She does not have a house of her own, she’s a renter.

Diana has been employed as a private employee for a year and a half.  She works Monday to Saturday all day and in the evenings and in her free time she sells food; she’s been in business three years.  She also makes snacks but only on order.

She’s been in the communal bank for three years and will use her new loan to buy ingredients to prepare her dishes.  Her dream is to own a house.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Belinda Mercedes

texts.es:
Doña Belinda   es  una  persona  muy emprendedora dedicada a su negocio, que  es pulpería. Ella vive con sus 2 hijos. En Choluteca en el sur de Honduras. Y tiene más de 18 años de tener este tipo  de negocio. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de maíz, frijoles, café, azúcar, pan, refrescos, pastas y  leña, de  esta manera  incrementar más  sus ventas.
Con el préstamo  espera  incrementar  sus  ventas  y  a si  atender  mejor  a sus  clientes, y  de  esta  manera  agenciarse  de  mejores  utilidades.
Espera tener  mejores  ingresos  y  a si tener  mejor   forma  de  vida. Sus sueños   es que en los próximos 2 años poner un pequeño mini súper ya que las  condiciones de  competencia son muy aceptables y poder darles  a sus  hijos lo  mejor.
Choluteca  Honduras - Abril del 2012
texts.en:
Belinda is a very enterprising person who is dedicated to her business, which is a grocery store. She lives with her 2 children in Choluteca in the south of Honduras and she has been working in this type of business for more than 18 years. She will use the loan to buy corn, beans, coffee, sugar, bread, soft drinks, sauces and firewood in order to increase her sales. 

With this loan she hopes to increase her sales and provide a better service to her customers, and thereby increase her earnings and have a better way of life. Her dream is to be able to start up a mini supermarket in the next 2 years as the conditions of competition are very favourable, and to be able to give the best to her children. 

Choluteca, Honduras - April 2012

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, coffee, sugar, bread, soft drinks, sauces and firewood for her business.

loans.name: Eimy Cecilia

texts.es: Eimy de 32 años de edad, vive al sur de la ciudad  con su cónyuge y  sus dos hijos en las edades de 6 y 8 años. Allí mismo se dedica a la venta de mercancía variada, negocio que empezó desde hace 6 años, con ahorros propios para poyar el bienestar de su hogar. Su principal negocio es vender a los estudiantes camisetas que estampa con los logotipos de universidades, donde tiene contactos que la apoyan en su gestión. También vende mercancía variada, mediante la modalidad de crédito a sus clientes, de quienes  recibe una cuota inicial por el valor del 50%, al entregarle la prenda y la otra parte la pagan en tres partidas.  Su meta más adelante es tener un local con empleados y confeccionar y estampar ella misma las camisetas, además de extender su mercado a otras instituciones educativas, para generar mayores posibilidades de ingresos. Su principal desafió es el capital de trabajo con el que cuenta, que no es suficiente para el cumplimiento de sus propósitos. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará en camisetas en mayor cantidad y también invertirá, en mercancía apropiada para regalar detalles en el día de las madres, que se acerca y  en consecuencia, usualmente se incrementan sus ventas y con ello sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Eimy, 32, lives in the south of the city with her spouse and two children who are 6 and 8 years old.  She sells assorted merchandise there too, a business she started six years ago with her own savings in order to support her home’s wellbeing.  Her main business is selling t-shirts that she prints university logos on to students; she has contacts there that support her enterprise.  

She also sells assorted merchandise to her customers on credit.  She collects an initial payment of 50% and when she delivers the item they pay the remainder in three installments.  Her goal for later on is to have a locale with employees and to make and print the t-shirts herself as well as to extend her market to other educational institutions to generate more additional income possibilities.  Her main challenge is working capital which is insufficient to meet her goals.

This is the reason for calling on her Kiva loan, the first financing she gets from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo that she’ll use to buy t-shirts in larger amounts; she will also invest in merchandise appropriate for Mother’s Day gifts since it’s approaching and sales as well as income generally increase with it.

loans.use: to buy t-shirts in larger amounts and also to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Iris

texts.es: Iris de 48  años de edad vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en las edades de 17 a 22 años en un barrio ubicado al sur de la ciudad, donde tiene un negocio de venta de bebidas frías, productos fritos y también vende mercancía mediante revistas especializadas. Su experiencia empresarial data desde hace 16 años, cuando inició vendiendo cervezas, hielo y chicha de maíz, con un pequeño capital que le regaló su cónyuge. Posteriormente con sus propias ganancias, adquirió un enfriador y compró mayor cantidad de envases y así mismo empezó a vender bebidas bien frías y agradables, ajustadas al clima caliente del caribe Colombiano. Gradualmente ha aprovechado muy bien su clientela cautiva, para diversificar su oferta y así poder ofrecer créditos a sus clientes en los artículos que necesitan, especialmente en  la línea de cosméticos. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará nuevas cajas de cervezas, para venderle a negocios cercanos,  cuando a ellos se les termine el inventario, situación que ocurre usualmente. Con su credikiva también comprará mercancías variadas, que tiene encargadas por sus clientes, para atender los requerimientos del día de las madres, que ya se acerca y es una de las épocas de mayor movimiento en sus ventas. Su meta mas adelante es terminar de adecuar su vivienda  y continuar su crecimiento empresarial, aumentando aun mas su margen de utilidades.
texts.en: Iris, 48 years old, lives with her partner and her two children, aged 17 and 22, in a neighborhood south of the city, where she has a business selling cold drinks and fried food. She also sells merchandise through specialized catalogues. Her business experience dates back 16 years, when she started selling beer, ice, and corn chicha (a fermented drink) with a small amount of capital her partner gave her. Later, with her own earnings, she acquired a fryer and bought more bottles, and also began to sell very cold and pleasant drinks, adjusted to Colombia's hot Caribbean climate. Gradually she has made very good use of her captive customer base in order to diversify what she offers and thus be able to offer her customers credit for the items they need, especially cosmetics. Currently she is applying for a Kiva loan, the first financing she has had with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will use it to buy new cases of beer in order to sell them to nearby businesses when they run out of inventory, a situation that usually happens. With her Kiva loan she will also buy a variety of merchandise that her customers have ordered, in order to meet the requirements of Mother's Day, since it is coming soon and it is one of the times when she moves the most merchandise. Her goal in the future is to finish adapting her house and to continue her business growth, increasing her profit margin even more.

loans.use: to purchase new cases of beer as well as a variety of merchandise that her customers have ordered

loans.name: Flor María

texts.es:
La Señora. Flor es socia del banco comunal Medio Ejido, vive por el sector de la Mutualista Azuay en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad con hermosos paisajes permitiéndonos admirar la belleza de la naturaleza, es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, tiene una gran belleza natural y cultural, la misma que aun conservan sus habitantes.

Doña Flor tiene 30 años, vive en unión libre y fruto de esa unión ha concebido 3 hijos de 14, 13 y 11 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos están estudiando en el colegio y su último hijo está en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo labora prestando sus servicios como guardia de seguridad, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.

La Señora. Flor se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y al cuidando a su familia, en sus tiempos libres vende ropa, realiza esta actividad recorriendo por las casas de sus amigas y conocidas, labora de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo.
 
En el banco comunal se encuentra en el tercer crédito que realiza y lo va a invertir en la compra de ropa para aumentar así su mercadería.

Su meta es tener una boutique.
texts.en:
Sra. Flor is a member of the Medio Ejido Communal Bank. She lives in the Mutualista Azuay area of the city of Cuenca, a city with beautiful scenery, which allows us to admire the beauty of nature. In December, 1999,  it was declared a World Heritage Site. The city has both natural and cultural beauty, which is being conserved by its residents.

Flor is 30 years old. She lives with her common law husband with whom she has had three children, ages 14, 13 and 11. Her first two are studying in secondary school and her youngest son is in a little school in the city. Her husband works offering services as a security guard. They do  not own their home and are renters.

Flor works at tasks in her home and caring for her family. In her spare time she sells clothing. She does so by going to the homes of her friends and acquaintances and works from Sunday to Sunday without a fixed schedule.

This is her third loan as a member of the communal bank. She will use it to purchase clothing to expand her line of merchandise.

Her goal is to own a boutique.

loans.use: to purchase clothing.

loans.name: Cirila

texts.es:
Cirila tiene 40 años, es una mujer muy activa y trabajadora que vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Hilario, de 47 años, y sus 3 queridos hijos.

Diariamente se levanta muy temprano para preparar el desayuno de sus hijos  y enviarlos a su escuela. Seguidamente, se dirige a su parcela para ver el avance de sus plantas de cacao, labor que realiza junto a su esposo, quien la apoya en todo momento para obtener una buena cosecha. 
En el futuro, desea comprar injertos de cacao para incrementar su producción, pero ahora lo que prioriza es comprar otro terreno de cultivo para ampliar su parcela y seguir con sus planes de trabajo.

Este es su crédito número 5 con MFP y se compromete a ser puntual con sus cuotas de pago. Asimismo, agrace a su banco comunal por ser personas comprometidas y responsables.
Con los 3,500 nuevos soles que ahora solicita, más el ahorro de su anterior cosecha, comprará una hectárea de terreno.
texts.en:
Cirila, age 40, is an active and hardworking woman. She lives in her own home along with her husband Hilario, age 47, and their three beloved children.

Every day, she wakes up early to prepare breakfast for her children before sending them off to school. Afterwards, she heads out toward her parcel of land so that she can oversee her cacao plants. Cirila and her husband work together. They support one another all the time so that they can achieve a good harvest. In the future, she wants to buy cacao buds for grafting so that she can increase her production, but now her priority is to buy another plot of land so that she can expand her property and continue with her business plans.

This is her fifth loan with MFP and she promises to be punctual with her loan payments. In addition, she is grateful that her Communal Bank consists of committed and responsible people. The loan of 3,500 PEN that she requested, along with the savings from her previous harvest, will be used to buy one hectare of farmland.

loans.use: to buy a plot of farmland.

loans.name: Rosa Isabel

texts.es:
Rosa, tiene 56 años de edad, vive con sus dos hijos, que están estudiando, ella se dedica a la venta de medicinas naturales, trabaja de lunes a viernes, desde hace 3 años, inicio por una amiga, quien le ha ayudado a obtener experiencia.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos como el Aloe vera, uña de gato, omega tres, linaza, y otros más productos que son elaborados de forma natural, estos le ayudaran a incrementar el negocio y a poder proveer a sus clientes de mejores productos.
Su objetivo es fortalecer el negocio a través de este préstamo, ofrecerles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosa, 56, lives with her two children, who are in school.  She sells natural medicines.  She has worked from Monday through Friday for three years.  She started because of a friend who has helped her gain experience.

She is requesting a loan to buy products such as aloe vera, cat's claw, omega-3, linseed, and other products that are made naturally.  These help her to increase her business and be able to provide her customers with better products.

Her goals are to strengthen her business with this loan and give her children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy aloe vera, cat's claw, omega-3, and linseed.

loans.name: Sharikan

texts.ru:
Шарикан – лидер группы «Айнуска», ей 62 года, вдова.  Шарикан занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес в 1990 году с суммы 20,000 сом (KGS).  Имея в хозяйстве 8 дойных коров и 100 овец,  и получая прибыль в сумме около 20,000 сом в месяц с продажи молока и молочных продуктов, Шарикан намерена и далее развивать животноводство.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Шарикан обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дополнительных голов скота - молодняка.  Доходы от кредита Шарикан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья.
texts.en: Sharikan is the leader of the "Aynuska" group.  She is 62 years old and a widow.  Sharikan is involved in animal husbandry, having started this business in 1990 with a sum of 20,000 som (KGS).  Having 8 dairy cows and 100 sheep in her business and earning a profit of about 20,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of milk and milk products, she intends to continue developing her animal husbandry business.  In order to further grow her business, Sharikan requested a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy additional heads of young livestock.  She plans to invest the earnings into a further increase of livestock headcount.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Bakhtiyor

texts.ru: Бахтиёр уже три года как занимается производством хлебобулочных изделий. Он холост. Ему 24 года. Бахтиёр имеет среднее образование. Он берет кредит для покупки муки и необходимых продуктов, чтобы печь хлеб для торговли.
texts.en: Bakhtiyor has been involved in making bakery goods for three years.  He is 24 years old and single.  Bakhtiyor has a secondary education.  He is requesting this loan to buy flour and necessary products in order to make bread for sale.

loans.use: to buy flour and necessary products

loans.name: Mirzogani

texts.ru: Мизогани проживает в районе Спитамен. Ему 25 лет. Он женат. У него двое детей. Мирзогани более пяти лет занимается скотоводством. Он берет кредит для закупа телят в дальнейшем для продажи.
texts.en: Mirzogani lives in the Spitamen district.  He is 25 years old, married and has two children.  Mirzogani has been involved in animal husbandry for over five years.  He is requesting this loan to buy calves for future resale.

loans.use: to buy calves for future resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo, and beverages.

loans.name: Marcela Marleni

texts.es: Marcela es socia del Bancomunal Sol Radiante, tiene 47 años de edad, es madre soltera de 3 hijos, y socia de FINCA Perú  hace 3 años. Es docente, pero también se dedica a la venta de productos lácteos y derivados como leche y queso. Ella dice que las capacitaciones que recibe en su Bancomunal son muy buenas porque las motivan a seguir emprendiendo pese a las dificultades que se les presenten. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de productos lácteos como leche, queso, yogurt y mantequilla.
texts.en:
Marcela is a member of Sol Radiante Communal Bank.  She is 47 years old and a single mother of three children.  She has been a member of FINCA Perú for three years.

She is a teacher but she also sells dairy products and derivatives, such as milk and cheese.

She says that the training she receives in her communal bank is very good because it motivates them to continue being enterprising despite the difficulties that might present themselves.  

She will invest the loan she is requesting in buying dairy products such as milk, cheese, yogurt, and butter.

loans.use: to buy dairy products such as milk, cheese, yogurt, and butter.

loans.name: Manzuura

texts.ru: Манзууре 54 года, замужем, воспитала 5 детей. В 2005 году, в поисках источника дохода для своей семьи,  Манзуура начала свой бизнес в торговле продуктами питания на рынке. Благодаря настойчивости  и упорному труду,  Манзуура сумела развить свой бизнес  с ежемесячным доходом  в 30,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день ассортимент товаров не представлен в изобилии, и по этой причине Манзуура обратилась  в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 135,000 сом (KGS).  Доходы от кредита Манзуура планирует частично вложить в развитие бизнеса, и часть -  в подготовку приданого для дочери, которая осенью выходит замуж.
texts.en: Manzuura is 54 years old, married and raised five children.  In search of a source of income for her family, she started her own business selling food products at a market in 2005.  Thanks to her persistence and hard work, Manzuura was able to develop her business to have a monthly income of 30,000 som (KGS).  Today, her product selection is still limited, and this is why Manzuura requested a loan in the amount of 135,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan partially into developing her business and partially into preparing a dowry for her daughter, who is getting married in autumn.

loans.use: to broaden an assortment of goods

loans.name: Aliakbar

texts.ru: Алиакбар проживает в районе Дж. Руми. Ему 26 лет. Он женат. У него двое детей. Его дети маленькие, а жена домохозяйка. Сам Алиакбар занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. Также он занимается скотоводством. Разводит крупнорогатый скот у себя дома. В этой области он четыре года. Кредит берет для закупа бычков и минеральных удобрений. Он хочет внести минеральные удобрения в урожай кукурузы и лука. Кроме того он хочет увеличить поголовье крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Aliakbar lives in the J.Rumy district.  He is 26 years old, married and has two children.  His children are small, and wife is a homemaker.  Aliakbar is involved in sowing agricultural crops.  He is also involved in animal husbandry.  He breeds cattle at home.  He has been in this business for four years.  Aliakbar is requesting this loan to buy bulls and mineral fertilizers.  He wants to add mineral fertilizers for a good harvest of corn and onions.  Besides this, he wants to increase cattle headcount.

loans.use: to buy bulls and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Zaripa

texts.ru: Зарипа – участник группы «Айнуска», замужем. Зарипа занимается животноводством,  имеет в хозяйстве 3 дойные коровы, 1 бычка. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Зарипа обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку 1 лошади.  Доходы от кредита Зарипа планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья.
texts.en: Zaripa is a member of "Ainuska" group and is married.  Zaripa raises livestock and currently owns 3 milking cows and 1 calf. To further develop her business, Zaripa has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy 1 horse. She plans to invest profits from this loan into increasing the headcount of her livestock.

loans.use: to purchase a livestock

loans.name: Ukhtamkan

texts.ru: Уктамхан – участник группы «Айнуска», 62года, замужем. Уктамхан  в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством. На сегодня Уктамхан имеет в хозяйстве 2 дойные коровы, 1 лошадь, продажа молочных продуктов приносит около 10,000 сом в месяц.  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Уктамхан обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дойной коровы.  Доходы от кредита Уктамхан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Ukhtamkan is a member or "Ainuska" group. She is 62 years old and is married.  Ukhtamkan raises livestock as the primary income for her family. Currently Ukhtamkan owns 2 milking cows and 1 horse and she earns approximately 10,000 som per month from sales of dairy products. To further develop her business, Ukhtamkan has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy a milking cow. She plans to invest profits from this loan into further expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Las Gemelas Group

texts.es:
El grupo las Gemelas lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedora una de ellas es Mariela quien vende ropa y cosméticos, además vende fritanga restaurante popular que consiste en la venta de comida frita como tacos, enchiladas, tajadas con queso…etc. El crédito actual  lo invertirá en mercadería en ropa pantalones, camisas y blusas entre otros productos.
Mariela está casada con Giovanny quien es contratista y con el cual tiene tres hijos.
Sus compañeras de grupo son Martha quien tiene una pequeña venta de ropa la cual tiene la meta de ampliarla y Carla Patricia quien vende ropa usada desde hace 3 años.
texts.en:
Las Gemelas [The Twins] group is made up of three hard-working and enterprising people. One of them is Mariela who sells clothes and cosmetics, and moreover she sells at a popular fried food restaurant. It sells fried food like tacos, enchiladas, fried plantain chips with cheese, etc. She will invest the current loan in clothing merchandise; pants, shirts and blouses among other products.

Mariela is married to Giovanny who is a contractor and they have three children. 

Hey group members are Martha who has a small clothing business, with the goal of expanding it, and Carla Patricia who has sold used clothing for 3 years.

loans.use: to buy clothing merchandise (pants, jeans, blouses, shirts, etc.)

loans.name: Girasoles Group

texts.es:
El grupo Girasoles lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras originarias de Niquinomo una de ellas  es Bismar quien se dedica al comercio de ropa usada desde hace 4 años en uno de los mercados de Managua, las ventas del negocio son  aproximadamente 15,000 córdobas mensuales. El invertirá el credito en la compra de mercaderia con la compra de pacas de ropa. 
Las otras integrantes son Patricia quien vende ropa usada desde hace 4 años, Ana quien es profesora y comercializa cosméticos y Yamir quien vende frutas desde hace 7 años.
texts.en:
The group Girasoles consists of three working adults and the original entrepreneurs of Niquinomo, one of whom is Bismar.  Bismar has sold used clothing for the last four years in one of the marketplaces in Managua.  His monthly sales total approximately 15,000 cordobas.  He plans to use his loan to buy more clothing in bulk.  

The other group members include Patricia, who has sold clothes for the past four years, and Ana who is a professor and cosmetics salesperson.  Yamir has sold fruit for the past 7 years and is also part of the group.

loans.use: to buy clothing in bulk

loans.name: Rolando

texts.es:
Rolando tiene 35 años, vive con Luisa, la madre de sus 4 hijos. El mayor de ellos tiende 14 años y el más pequeño apenas 2 añitos. Todos ellos viven en su casa propia ubicada en una comunidad nativa en Chanchamayo.

Él es un hombre innovador y aventurero, se dedica a la agricultura con el cultivo de plátanos y naranjas en una parcela de terreno, pero también se encarga de producir palmeras; "siembro palmeras y las hago crecer hasta el metro y medio luego las vendo en la ciudad de Lima", cuenta. Este negocio es nuevo y único en su zona, por ello debe viajar constantemente hacia la capital del país. Las palmeras necesitan 8 meses para que tengan el tamaño adecuado para quitarlas del suelo; y son vendidas con fin ornamental, para parques y jardines de otras ciudades. Su comercialización es rentable. Los meses donde sus ventas aumentan son setiembre, octubre y noviembre, en esos meses traslada de 60 a 80 plantas. Rolando confía que aumentará su producción de palmeras, así como de los otros productos, pero para ello requiere de los préstamos de MFP.

Éste es su crédito número 8, por eso se compromete en pagar puntualmente las cuotas mensuales. Él pertenece al banco comunal "Las Rositas de Ubiriki", grupo del que se siente identificado y a gusto por el trabajo solidario que desempeñan los socios.
Con el dinero que ahora solicita comprará semilla de palmeras y bolsas de fertilizantes para su producción.
texts.en:
Rolando is 35 years old. He lives with Luisa, the mother of his 4 children. The oldest of them is 14 years old and the youngest is hardly 2. All of them live in their own house located in a native community in Chanchamayo. 

He is an innovative and adventurous man. He is a farmer and grows bananas and oranges on a parcel of land, but he also grows date palms. "I plant date palms and grow them up to a meter and a half, then sell them in the city of Lima", he says. This business is new and unique in his area, due to which he constantly has to travel to the capital of the country. The date palms need 8 months to grow to the right size to be harvested; they are sold for ornamental use, for parks and gardens in other cities. His business is profitable. The months when his sales increase are September, October, and November. In those months he moves 60 to 80 plants. Rolando confides that he will increase his production of date palms, as well as other produce, but for that he needs the loans from MFP.

This is his 8th loan, so he promises to be punctual in his monthly repayments. He belongs to the "Las Rositas de Ubiriki" ("The Little Roses of Ubiriki") communal bank, a group with which he identifies, and which he likes because of the supportive work the members do.

With the money he is now requesting, he will purchase date palm seeds and bags of fertilizer to grow them.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a horse

loans.name: Ma'murjon

texts.ru: Маъмурчон проживает в городе Душанбе. Ему 21 год. Он холост. Его мать занимается торговлей. Сам он уже более года предоставляет услугу, такси. Кредит берет для приобретения автомашины марки Opel.
texts.en: Ma'murjon lives in the city of Dushanbe.  He is 21 years old and single.  His mother is involved in sales.  Ma'murjon has been providing a taxi service for over a year.  He is requesting this loan to purchase an Opel car.

loans.use: to purchase an Opel car

loans.name: Ilhom

texts.ru: Илхом проживает в городе Душанбе. Ему 48 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Илхом занимается торговлей на рынке. У него магазин, где он продает ткани, занавески и шторы. Торговлей он занимается уже три года. Кредит берет для приобретения автомашины. Он хочет купить машину своему сыну, чтобы он занялся свои делом.
texts.en: Ilhom lives in the city of Dushanbe.  He is 48 years old, married and has three children.  Ilhom is involved in sales at a market.  He has a store, where he sells fabrics, curtains and drapes.  He has been involved in sales for three years.  Ilhom is requesting this loan to buy a car.  He wants to buy a car for his son, so that he could start his own business.

loans.use: to purchase a car

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es: El señor Ricardo es un hombre trabajador y emprendedor quien se dedica a la venta de perecederos desde hace 8 años en el Mercado local sus principales producto  que vende son tomate, chiltoma, cebolla…etc. en los cuales invertirá el crédito.
texts.en: Señor Ricardo Franciso is a hard-working and enterprising man who makes a living selling perishables, which he has done for 8 years in the local marketplace.  The main products that he sells are tomatoes, chiltoma peppers, onions, etc., in which he will invest the loan.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, chiltoma peppers, and onions.

loans.name: Ideal Group

texts.es:
El grupo Ideal está conformado por tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas Tania  de 23 años quien realiza y vende ropa típica desde hace 5 años cuenta con dos trabajadoras e invertirá el crédito en telas, bordados, crochet….etc. 
Las otras integrantes son Thelma Rafaela de 64 años se dedica al comercio de frutas y verduras desde hace 30 años e Irene quien comercializa ropa típica desde hace 8 años.
texts.en:
The Ideal Group is made up of three hard-working and entrepreneurial women.  One of them is Tania, 23 years old, who has been making and selling traditional clothing for five years.  She relies on two workers and will invest the loan in material, embroidery, crochet, etc.  

The other members are 64-year-old Thelma Rafaela, who has made a living selling fruits and vegetables for 30 years; and Irene, who has sold traditional clothing for eight years.

loans.use: to buy material, thread, embroidery, etc.

loans.name: Las Mañanitas Group

texts.es:
El grupo las Mañanitas lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Walkiria quien vende productos varios en especial juguetes tales como muñecas, pistolas de agua, carros…etc. desde hace 10 años. En el negocio las ventas mensuales son de 28,800 aproximadamente e invertirá el crédito en juguetes.

Ella inicio con una floristeria y con las ganancias y creditos fue invirtiendo en otros rubros como son los juguetes. Ella ha logrado que ambos negocios crezca.

Las otras integrantes son Gloria quien vende ropa y calzado desde hace 6 años y Martha quien vende ropa y productos de limpieza desde hace 3 años.
texts.en:
The group "Las Mañanitas" consists of three hardworking and enterprising individuals.  One of them is Walkiria, who sells various products, but mostly toys such as dolls, water pistols, cars, and other items.  She has been in business for 10 years and her monthly sales are approximately 28,800 HNL.  Walkiria will invest her loan in toys.  She started out by opening a floral shop, but she used her earnings and loans to invest in other ventures, such as selling toys.  Walkiria has been able to grow both of her businesses.  

The other members are as follows:
• Gilma has been selling clothes and shoes for six years.
• Martha has been selling clothes and cleaning products for three years.

loans.use: to buy toys.

loans.name: La Finca Group

texts.es:
El grupo la Finca lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras, emprendedoras, joviales y humildes  una de ellas es Concepción de 58 años. Ella se dedica al comercio de carne actividad que realiza desde hace 31 años con lo cual saco adelante a su familia. El crédito lo invertirá en carne de res, cerdo y pollo.
Los otros integrantes son Heydi de 29 años, casada y tiene un niño (el sale en la foto de grupo junto a su madre); ella  vende ropa y Jorge de 21 años desde hace 1 ½ años comercializa carne y cosméticos.
texts.en:
The group la Finca [the Farm] is made up of three hardworking, enterprising, cheerful, and humble people.  

One of them is Concepción, who is 58 years old and makes a living in the meat business.  She has done this work for 31 years while supporting her family.  The loan will be used to buy beef, pork, and chicken.  

The other members are Heydi, 29, who is married with one child (pictured in the photo with his mother), and Jorge, 21.  Heydi has sold clothes for three years, and Jorge has sold meat and cosmetics for 1½ years.

loans.use: to buy meat (round steak, trimmings and bones)

loans.name: Mary

texts.es:
Mary es una mujer de 23  años de edad, de estado civil casada, con tres hijos a su cargo, Vive con su cónyuge y sus hijos en casa propia.  Ella  vive en la zona rural del distrito de Lambayeque, y además  cuenta con los servicios de agua y luz, el lugar es una comunidad pequeña con un aproximado de 50  familias.

La actividad principal que desarrolla Mary es la crianza y  comercialización  de animales como: pavos, patos, gallinas, cerdos y chivos, donde les da  alimentos concentrado y cuando alcanzan el tamaño y peso exacto los comercializa a los comerciantes mayoristas de la zona; esta actividad la realiza desde hace 4 años, así mismo esta actividad aprendió  de sus padres, es decir conoce a la perfección el rubro. Su cónyuge también le apoya en estas actividades.   

El monto otorgado del préstamo es de S/. 600 nuevos soles y  será para invertir en la compra de alimentos como: maíz, purina, vitaminas y arreglo de corrales; y de esta forma ir creciendo con su negocio y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Mary is a 23-year-old married woman with three children in her care.  She lives with her husband and children in her own house with water and electricity in the rural area of the district of Lambayeque.  It is a small community with approximately 50 families.
